member.name: M:SA1611Repro.Program.GetContentAsync(System.Uri,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the content of the specified uri as a stream asynchronously.
member.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous operation.
member.param: a cancellation token used to propagate notification that the asynchronous operation should be canceled.
member.exception: thrown if the cancellation token has had cancellation requested
